headline: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez Rips Kevin McCarthy’s Criticism Of ‘His Little KKK Caucus’
author: Lee Moran
sentences: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-N.Y.) didn’t buy House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy’s (R-Calif.) criticism of Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) and Paul Gosar (R-Ariz) for speaking at a white nationalist America First Political Action Conference over the weekend.

McCarthy’s claim there was “no place in our party for any of this” rang hollow for Ocasio-Cortez, who slammed the House GOP leader for “protecting his little KKK Caucus for years” with “toothless” statements.

https://t.co/on4twfags5
— Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (@AOC) February 28, 2022
In a second post, Ocasio-Cortez recalled Gosar’s sharing on social media last year of an anime video of himself killing her.

It’s not an exaggeration in the slightest to say he works to protect them.”
The House sanctioned both Greene and Gosar for past offenses, but McCarthy imposed no punishments for either of them.

McCarthy stood on the House floor and passionately defended Rep. Gosar, who also headlined fundraisers for white nationalist orgs & escalated into inciting violence in the House.
“McCarthy stood on the House floor and passionately defended Rep. Gosar, who also headlined fundraisers for white nationalist orgs and escalated into inciting violence in the House,” she said.

Other Republicans condemned Greene and Gosar for attending the white nationalist group’s event in Florida.

He’s just as culpable.”
McCarthy has been protecting his little KKK Caucus for years with these toothless statements and meetings.
Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell said there was “no place in the Republican Party for white supremacists or antisemitism.”
“He’s now helped them for so long they’ve escalated their open antisemitism & collaboration w/ white nationalist groups.
